Tunable.name: _EMBARRASSED_AFFORDANCE
Tunable.description: The affordance a Sim will play when getting embarrassed by walking in on a privacy situation.

Tunable.name: _MIN_ROOM_AREA_FOR_DISCOURAGEMENT
Tunable.description: The minimum allowed size for the room in square meters under which a discouragement area is not being created around the Sim. Note that for small room it is not really necessary to create a discouragement area as the sims will be shooed anyway if they are closer than SHOO_CONSTRAINT_RADIUS to the Sim requesting Privacy.

Tunable.name: _SHOO_CONSTRAINT_RADIUS
Tunable.description: The radius of the constraint a Shooed Sim will attempt to route to.

Tunable.name: _UNAVAILABLE_TOOLTIP
Tunable.description: Tooltip displayed when an object is not accessible due to being inside a privacy region.
